sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Button, Card, CardActions, CardContent, Typography, Grid, Dialog, DialogContent } from '@material-ui/core'; import vs from '../images/vs.png' import { getMatchDetail } from '../api/Api'; const MyCard = ({ match }) => { const [detail, setDetail] = useState({}) const [open, setOpen] = useState(false) const handleClick = (id) => { getMatchDetail(id) .then((data) => { console.log("Match Data", data) setDetail(data) }) .catch((error) => console.log(error)) } const getDailog = () => { {"Match Detail..."} {detail.stat} Match{ detail.matchStarted} } return ( {match["team-1"]} {match["team-2"]} ) } export default MyCard
